t: A Song{H7892} or Psalm{H4210} of David{H1732}. O God{H430}, my heart{H3820} is fixed{H3559}{(H8737)}; I will sing{H7891}{(H8799)} and give praise{H2167}{(H8762)}, even with my glory{H3519}.
Awake{H5782}{(H8798)}, psaltery{H5035} and harp{H3658}: I myself will awake{H5782}{(H8686)} early{H7837}.
I will praise{H3034}{(H8686)} thee, O LORD{H3068}, among the people{H5971}: and I will sing praises{H2167}{(H8762)} unto thee among the nations{H3816}.
For thy mercy{H2617} is great{H1419} above the heavens{H8064}: and thy truth{H571} reacheth unto the clouds{H7834}.
Be thou exalted{H7311}{(H8798)}, O God{H430}, above the heavens{H8064}: and thy glory{H3519} above all the earth{H776};
That thy beloved{H3039} may be delivered{H2502}{(H8735)}: save{H3467}{(H8685)} with thy right hand{H3225}, and answer{H6030}{(H8798)} me.

God{H430} hath spoken{H1696}{(H8765)} in his holiness{H6944}; I will rejoice{H5937}{(H8799)}, I will divide{H2505}{(H8762)} Shechem{H7927}, and mete out{H4058}{(H8762)} the valley{H6010} of Succoth{H5523}.
Gilead{H1568} is mine; Manasseh{H4519} is mine; Ephraim{H669} also is the strength{H4581} of mine head{H7218}; Judah{H3063} is my lawgiver{H2710}{(H8781)};
Moab{H4124} is my washpot{H7366}{H5518}; over Edom{H123} will I cast out{H7993}{(H8686)} my shoe{H5275}; over Philistia{H6429} will I triumph{H7321}{(H8709)}.
Who will bring{H2986}{(H8686)} me into the strong{H4013} city{H5892}? who will lead{H5148}{(H8804)} me into Edom{H123}?
Wilt not thou, O God{H430}, who hast cast us off{H2186}{(H8804)}? and wilt not thou, O God{H430}, go forth{H3318}{(H8799)} with our hosts{H6635}?
Give{H3051}{(H8798)} us help{H5833} from trouble{H6862}: for vain{H7723} is the help{H8668} of man{H120}.
Through God{H430} we shall do{H6213}{(H8799)} valiantly{H2428}: for he it is that shall tread down{H947}{(H8799)} our enemies{H6862}.
